name: GetMeetingSurveyInfo
description:
Retrieve details about a Zoom meeting survey.

This tool retrieves information about a specified Zoom meeting survey. It is useful for Pro users who have the Meeting Survey feature enabled and require insights into scheduled meetings. Note: Instant meetings do not support surveys.

parameters.name: meeting_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for a Zoom meeting. Should be stored as a long-format integer to accommodate IDs longer than 10 digits.

value_schema.description:
The meeting's ID. 

 When storing this value in your database, store it as a long-format integer and **not** a simple integer. Meeting IDs can be more than 10 digits.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Zoom API.

parameters.name: meetingId
parameters.description:
The meeting's ID. 

 When storing this value in your database, store it as a long-format integer and **not** a simple integer. Meeting IDs can be more than 10 digits.

The meeting's ID. 

 When storing this value in your database, store it as a long-format integer and **not** a simple integer. Meeting IDs can be more than 10 digits.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
